channel.title: Visualization on Sébastien Galais
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Sébastien Galais

item.title: Calabi-Yau manifold
item.description: Why this first post ? … When I started this github page, I wanted to add a logo at the top of the main page and I thought of a Calabi-Yau manifold. In my opinion, the 3D representation of that manifold is particularly artistic and this object is used in a theory that I find highly interesting : string theory (Susskind’s website is so cool). Ok the logo is chosen, but I don’t want to take a picture from another website, trim it, etc.
